Topic: Draw two habitats and the different living things in each
Evidence Statements: The student can draw two different habitats, one on land and one in water.
The student can draw and label different types of plants in each habitat.
The student can draw and label different types of animals in each habitat.
The student can observe and show the diversity of life in each habitat by including various living things.
The student can compare and contrast the different living things found in each habitat through their drawing.
The student can look for and highlight patterns of plant and animal diversity in their drawings.
